nodes.text:
Conrad Gall was a Human male who served as the leader of Dagger Wing during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Around 3641 BBY, Gall and the rest of Dagger Wing were still imprisoned on Belsavis when the Empire led a full-scale assault on the planet, and they aided the Republic security forces in trying to secure the facility.
